trans-unit.source: Represents the [<diagnostics>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) element in the Web.config configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 代表[<診斷>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) Web.config 組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The DiagnosticsElement class represents the [\<diagnostics>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) element in a Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: DiagnosticsElement 類別代表[\<診斷 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4ca05d1-1e10-4873-9ef6-75e55851d888) Web.config 檔案中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement.SuppressReturningExceptions%2A> property to true in order to return exceptions to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement.SuppressReturningExceptions%2A>屬性設定為 true，若要傳回用戶端以進行偵錯例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement.SuppressReturningExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Services.Configuration.DiagnosticsElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service returns exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出服務是否會傳回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service returns exceptions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服務傳回例外狀況。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
